author: potuz
content: The branch with this assert is the branch in which the parent block was empty, therefore the parent hash for the current block needs to be equal to the parent hash of the previous block, namely the hash of the grandparent

author: stefanbratanov
content: I am working on the payload attestations aggregation logic, when a lower number of validators is configured, a validator can be in the ptc multiple times as per current spec if I implemented it correctly, that means we have to fill the aggregation_bits for each of the positions relative to the PTC right?
